Advanced Rooofing Contractors PTY LTD

Advanced Roofing provides roofing and cladding services for domestic and industrial construction.

We distinguish ourselves in the industry by our commitment to delivering a high standard of work.

Established 2007

About our Director

With more than 50 years in the field, company director David Hargreaves is an established figure in the roofing and construction industries in South Australia. He is known for his honesty and integrity, and extensive and deep knowledge of materials and construction.
